questions.question: In which type of thread rolling operation, the billet rotates as well as revolves also:

answers.a: in two rolls with guide system

explanations.a: Billet rotates but does not revolve.
explanations.c: Three roll systems cause rotation only.
explanations.d: Planetary dies cause both rotation and revolution.

questions.question: The following is not an advantage of thread rolling process over thread cutting process:

answers.a: quality of cold rolled products are good

explanations.a: Thread rolling produces high quality threads.
explanations.d: Thread rolling is not always cheaper.

questions.question: When considering the blank diameter tolerance, a change in blank diameter will affect the major diameter by an approximate ratio of 5 to 1:
Production rates of thread rolling processes are usually three to five times faster than thread cutting:

explanations.a: Thread rolling is significantly faster than cutting.

questions.question: A rolled thread can often be easily recognized because the thread has a smaller diameter than the blank rod from which it has been made:

explanations.a: Rolled threads have larger diameter than the blank.
